posts.post_content:
WITHDRAWN

Looking to consolidate (Trade) 2-3 of my Ty Cobbs into 1 or 2 upgraded T206 Cobb Portraits.

May consider T206 Walter Johnson or Mathewson Portraits, but prefer the Cobbs.


A few requirements:

No Qualifiers;
PSA Only;
No Half-Grades;
Common backs only; and
Centered Nice-for-Grade examples.


My available Trade Inventory:

Red SGC-35 Polar Bear;
Green PSA-2.5 Sweet Caporal;
Bat-on PSA-4 Sovereign; and
Bat-off PSA-4 Piedmont.



Scans at my Collector Focus Site:

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/GoBigRed/t206[/url]


Please reply to my email:

arkansas2014@gmail.com


Steve
